page.title: 13S.NORMANTON CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: We asked our parents which playground games were most popular in their school days. The two which came out top were skipping and tickey.These are still the most popular in the playground. Any number of people may play tickey.One person is "on", usually the person who suggested the game.The idea is to run faster than the person that is on so he can't touch you with his finger.If he does he is no longer on,the person who has been touched is. There are many variations of tickey,it is played in all kinds of weather,but not when it's too hot.All children in the school who are aged 7/11 seem to play tickey some playtime of the week.
